trans-unit.source: Provides a framework for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> elements that virtualize their child data collection.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma arquitetura concebida para <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> elementos virtualizar a recolha de dados os respetivos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma classe abstracta.

trans-unit.source: In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Neste contexto, "virtualizar" refere-se a uma técnica através do qual um subconjunto de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elementos são gerados a partir de um grande número de itens de dados com base nos quais os itens estão visíveis no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time.
trans-unit.target: É intensiva, tanto em termos de memória e do processador, para gerar um grande número de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos quando apenas algumas poderão no ecrã num determinado momento.

trans-unit.source: A panel that inherits from VirtualizingPanel, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>, calculates visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to only create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements for visible items.
trans-unit.target: Um painel que herda de VirtualizingPanel, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>, calcula itens visíveis e funciona com o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>(tais como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) apenas criar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos de itens visíveis.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The following lists describes cases when the VirtualizingPanel cannot virtualize item containers: - The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> contains item containers of different types.
trans-unit.target: As listas seguintes descreve casos, quando o VirtualizingPanel não é possível virtualizar o item contentores: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>contém item de contentores de diferentes tipos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> might have items that use both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> objects as the item containers.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>poderá ter itens que utilizam ambos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>objetos, como os contentores do item.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: - You explicitly create the item containers to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: -Cria explicitamente os contentores do item para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about explicitly versus implicitly creating item containers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre explicitamente versus implicitamente criar contentores de item, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: When a VirtualizingPanel is virtualizing item containers, you may need to save state information that is associated with a container instead of with the data item itself.
trans-unit.target: Quando um VirtualizingPanel é Virtualização de contentores do item, poderá ter de guardar as informações de estado que está associadas um contentor em vez de do próprio item de dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if an item is contained by an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> state is bound to the item container, and not to the data item itself.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um item está contido por um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander>controlo, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>Estado está vinculado ao contentor do item e não para o item de dados própria.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander> is reused for a new item, the current value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> is used for the new item.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander>é reutilizado para um novo item, o valor atual do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>é utilizado para o novo item.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the old item does not retain its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o item antigo não mantém o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*> collection of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>coleção de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>

trans-unit.source: This method offers better performance for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements that virtualize their child collection than does the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método oferece um desempenho melhor para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elementos virtualizar respetiva coleção subordinada do que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> child to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> subordinado para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, generates the item at the specified index location and makes it visible.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, gera o item na localização de índice especificado e torna visíveis.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the item that is generated and made visible.
trans-unit.target: A posição de índice do item de que é gerado e ficam visíveis.

trans-unit.source: Generates the item at the specified index location and makes it visible.
trans-unit.target: Gera o item na localização de índice especificado e torna visíveis.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the item that is generated and made visible.
trans-unit.target: A posição de índice do item de que é gerado e ficam visíveis.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> virtualizar itens que são agrupados ou organizados de uma hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CanHierarchicallyScrollAndVirtualizeCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CanHierarchicallyScrollAndVirtualizeCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CanHierarchicallyScrollAndVirtualizeCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> virtualizar itens que são agrupados ou organizados de uma hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> virtualizar itens que são agrupados ou organizados de uma hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> and support virtualizing items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy should override this method to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Classes de herdar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>e suporte de Virtualização de itens que são agrupados ou organizados numa hierarquia deve substituir este método para devolver `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> attached property from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>anexado a propriedade de.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>

trans-unit.source: The size of the cache before and after the viewport when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> is virtualizing.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da cache antes e depois da janela viewport quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> é virtualizar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*>

trans-unit.source: The default is of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A>propriedade é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*> attached property from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*>anexado a propriedade de.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*>

trans-unit.source: The type of unit that is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> property.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de unidade que é utilizado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*>

trans-unit.source: The default is of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable%2A> attached property `true`.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable%2A>ligado propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*> attached property from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*>anexado a propriedade de.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> should virtualize an item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> deve virtualizar um item; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object from which the attached property value is read.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a partir do qual é lido o valor da propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> is virtualizing its content; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> é virtualizar o respetivo conteúdo; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping%2A>propriedade é `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*> attached property from.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> virtualizes the grouped items in its collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> Virtualiza os itens agrupados na respetiva coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the specified item, relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a posição do item especificado, relativa a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.GetItemOffsetCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.GetItemOffsetCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.GetItemOffsetCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element whose position to find.
trans-unit.target: O elemento cuja posição localizar.

trans-unit.source: The position of the specified item, relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição do item especificado, relativo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the specified item, relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a posição do item especificado, relativa a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel> should override this method to return the position `child`, relative to the panel.
trans-unit.target: Classes de herdar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>devem substituir este método para devolver a posição `child`, relativo para o painel.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>

trans-unit.source: The element whose position to find.
trans-unit.target: O elemento cuja posição localizar.

trans-unit.source: 0 in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 0 em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollUnit>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit%2A>propriedade é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollUnit>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*> attached property from.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*>anexado a propriedade de.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*>

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether scrolling is measured as items in the collection or as pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o deslocamento é medido como itens na coleção ou pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*> attached property for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>anexado propriedade para o objeto especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>

trans-unit.source: The object from which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*> property is read.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a partir do qual o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>ler a propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the object uses container recycling.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores da enumeração que especifica se o objeto utiliza a Reciclagem do contentor.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*> collection of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> element at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>coleção de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> elemento da posição de índice especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>

trans-unit.source: This method offers better performance for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements that virtualize their child collection than does the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método oferece um desempenho melhor para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elementos virtualizar respetiva coleção subordinada do que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The index position within the collection at which the child element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: A posição de índice dentro da coleção à qual é inserido o elemento subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> child to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> subordinado para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the collection of child elements is cleared by the base <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a coleção de elementos subordinados está desmarcada, a base de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>coleção que está associada a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>gerado que o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removes child elements from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove a elementos subordinados do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren*>

trans-unit.source: This method offers better performance for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements that virtualize their child collection than does the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.RemoveRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método oferece um desempenho melhor para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elementos virtualizar respetiva coleção subordinada do que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.RemoveRange%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The beginning index position within the collection at which the first child element is removed.
trans-unit.target: A posição de índice de início dentro da coleção em que o primeiro elemento subordinado é removido.

trans-unit.source: The total number of child elements to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número total de elementos subordinados para remover da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*>anexado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>anexado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>

trans-unit.source: The cache is the amount of space above or below the viewport in which items are not virtualized.
trans-unit.target: A cache é a quantidade de espaço acima ou abaixo da janela viewport na qual os itens não estão virtualizados.

trans-unit.source: Use a cache to avoid generating [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements as they’re scrolled into view.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar uma cache para evitar a geração de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos, que está a deslocar numa vista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A> property determines the unit of measurement that is used by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A>propriedade determina a unidade de medida que é utilizada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to set the property on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para definir a propriedade no.

trans-unit.source: The size of the cache before and after the viewport when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> is virtualizing.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da cache antes e depois da janela viewport quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> é virtualizar.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit*>

trans-unit.source: The object to set the property on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para definir a propriedade no.

trans-unit.source: The type of unit that is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*> property.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de unidade que é utilizado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsContainerVirtualizable*>

trans-unit.source: The object to set the property on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para definir a propriedade no.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> should virtualize an item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> deve virtualizar um item; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizingProperty"></xref> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizingProperty"> </xref> ligado propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The object to which the attached property value is set.
trans-unit.target: O objecto ao qual o valor da propriedade anexada está definido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> is virtualizing; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> é virtualizar; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizingWhenGrouping*>

trans-unit.source: The object to set the property on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para definir a propriedade no.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref> virtualizes the grouped items in its collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para especificar que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref> Virtualiza os itens agrupados na respetiva coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit*>

trans-unit.source: The object to set the property on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para definir a propriedade no.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether scrolling is measured as items in the collection or as pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o deslocamento é medido como itens na coleção ou pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*> attached property on the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>anexado a propriedade do objeto especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: O elemento no qual pretende definir a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode*>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether `element` uses container recycling.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que especifica se `element` utiliza a Reciclagem do contentor.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a changed item in an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> affects the layout for this panel.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se um item alterado num <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> afeta o esquema para este painel.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the changed item is a direct child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the changed item is an indirect descendant of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item foi alterado é um subordinado direto <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o item foi alterado é um descendente indireta do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains data regarding the changed item.
trans-unit.target: Contém dados sobre o item foi alterado.
